SELECT a.*,u.id AS uid,u.username AS nickname,u.realname AS realname,u.phone_num AS phone FROM hd_area a LEFT JOIN hd_user u ON a.merid = u.id
AND a.merid = #{uid} AND u.username LIKE '%${dealer}%' AND u.realname LIKE '%${realname}%' AND u.phone_num = #{phone} AND a.name LIKE '%${paramete}%' AND a.address LIKE '%${remark}%'

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN `code` THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)AS equcount, SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(expiration_time,NOW())<0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS expirednum, SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(expiration_time,NOW()) BETWEEN 0 AND 15 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)AS almoexnum FROM hd_equipment WHERE aid=#{aid}

select a.id,a.tempid, ROUND(6378.138*2*ASIN(SQRT(POW(SIN((#{lat}*PI()/180-lat*PI()/180)/2),2)+ COS(#{lat}*PI()/180)*COS(lat*PI()/180)*POW(SIN((#{lon}*PI()/180- lon*PI()/180)/2),2)))*1000) AS distance , IFNULL(s.DCfreenum,0) as DCfreenum, IFNULL(s.DCAllnum,0) as DCAllnum,a.`name`,a.lat,a.lon,a.address,a.tempid, IFNULL(ct.chargefee,0) as DCchargeMoney,IFNULL(ct.serverfee,0) as DCserverMoney, IFNULL(ct.chargefee,0) as exchargeMoney,IFNULL(ct.serverfee,0) as exserverMoney FROM hd_area a LEFT JOIN (SELECT ap.aid, COUNT(CASE WHEN ap.port_status = 1 THEN 1 END) as DCfreenum, COUNT(ap.port_status) as DCAllnum FROM hd_allportstatus ap GROUP BY ap.aid) s on s.aid = a.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT chargefee,serverfee,`hour`,`minute`,parent_id from hd_charging_template WHERE `hour` < #{hour} or (`hour` = #{hour} and `minute` <= #{minute}) ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1) ct on ct.parent_id = a.tempid
and name like '%${areaname}%'
HAVING distance <= #{distance}
order by distance
LIMIT #{startnum}, 10

SELECT chargefee,serverfee,`hour`,`minute`,parent_id from hd_charging_template WHERE parent_id = #{tempid} and (`hour` < #{hour} or (`hour` = #{hour} and `minute` <= #{minute})) ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1

select ROUND(6378.138*2*ASIN(SQRT(POW(SIN((#{lat}*PI()/180-lat*PI()/180)/2),2)+ COS(#{lat}*PI()/180)*COS(lat*PI()/180)*POW(SIN((#{lon}*PI()/180- lon*PI()/180)/2),2)))*1000) AS distance , IFNULL(s.DCfreenum,0) as DCfreenum,IFNULL(s.DCAllnum,0) as DCAllnum,a.id,a.`name`,a.lat,a.lon,a.address,a.area_img,a.tempid FROM hd_area a LEFT JOIN (SELECT ap.aid, COUNT(CASE WHEN ap.port_status = 1 THEN 1 END) as DCfreenum,COUNT(ap.port_status) as DCAllnum FROM hd_allportstatus ap GROUP BY ap.aid) s on s.aid = a.id where a.id = #{id}
